Posts.EditableText:
I've just uploaded a new release to GitHub, [Quest 5.6.3](https://github.com/textadventures/quest/releases/tag/v5.6.3.1).

New translations:
- European Portuguese by João Frade
- Danish by Benjamin Lamberth

Features:
- Add `notfirst` to text processor (Pull Request [#828](https://github.com/textadventures/quest/pull/828) by @F2Andy)
- Increase number of layers supported by automapper (Pull Request [#838](https://github.com/textadventures/quest/pull/854) by @Cylius-Optimi)
- Monitor library files for changes (bug [#140](https://github.com/textadventures/quest/issues/140))
- Default `visited` to `false` (bug [#859](https://github.com/textadventures/quest/issues/859))
- Add switch on/off to `inventoryverbs` (bug [#860](https://github.com/textadventures/quest/issues/860))

Bug fixes:
- Apply command bar formatting when resetting UI
- Use UTF8 encoding for `.quest` resource filenames
- Fix mangled characters in game browser (bug [#819](https://github.com/textadventures/quest/issues/819))
- Don't allow adding a `look` verb (bug [#843](https://github.com/textadventures/quest/issues/843))

You can [download it here](https://github.com/textadventures/quest/releases/download/v5.6.3.1/quest563.exe).
Posts.HTML:
I've just uploaded a new release to GitHub, Quest 5.6.3.

New translations:

  • European Portuguese by João Frade
  • Danish by Benjamin Lamberth

Features:

  • Add notfirst to text processor (Pull Request #828 by @F2Andy)
  • Increase number of layers supported by automapper (Pull Request #838 by @Cylius-Optimi)
  • Monitor library files for changes (bug #140)
  • Default visited to false (bug #859)
  • Add switch on/off to inventoryverbs (bug #860)

Bug fixes:

  • Apply command bar formatting when resetting UI
  • Use UTF8 encoding for .quest resource filenames
  • Fix mangled characters in game browser (bug #819)
  • Don't allow adding a look verb (bug #843)

You can download it here.

Posts.EditableText: Awesome, thanks for the update, Alex !!!, as you work on QuestKit and/or whatever other projects/commitments you've got.
Posts.HTML: Awesome, thanks for the update, Alex !!!, as you work on QuestKit and/or whatever other projects/commitments you've got.

Posts.EditableText: Awesome thanks Alex for all the work for Quest, it really is a great product.
Posts.HTML: Awesome thanks Alex for all the work for Quest, it really is a great product.

Posts.EditableText:
There is quite the problem.... when I installed Quest 5.6.3  and I was about to open and try the software... there came a mesage saying that Quest has stopped working...I also checked the site if there is some kind of protocol to follow that I missed but none in the Download page that says about steps or the like Sir.... So I decided to uninstall and share  some info. just in case.
 The laptop is a Windows 7 Ultimate and 32-bit operating system...

Posts.EditableText:

Also you could try an earlier version to see if that works.
